item.title: Nifty Struggles Below 25,100: Will The Selling Pressure Deepen? SEBI Analysts Weigh In
item.description: Analysts warn that a break below 25,000 could trigger intensified selling. FII outflows and MSCI rebalancing risks may weigh on sentiment.

item.title: Tata Motors In Sell Zone As JLR Cyberattack Puts £2 Billion Loss On The Table
item.description: JLR’s production halt has weighed on Tata Motors, which trades in bearish territory. An investment advisor sees strong resistance near ₹700.

item.title: India Looking To Expand Energy Partnership With US: Commerce Minister Piyush Goyal
item.description: Energy trade will be a central focus of India-U.S. talks, alongside discussions on tariffs and market access.

item.title: JD.Com Stock Grabs Retail Eyeballs On Hong Kong Pop As China Moves To Level Food Delivery Playing Field
item.description: Shares of the Chinese retailing giant were up 6.2% in Hong Kong on Thursday afternoon.

item.title: Citi Stock Gains After Agreeing To Sell Stake In Banamex Unit For $2.3B To Mexican Tycoon
item.description: Citi had to abandon a complete sale of its Mexican retail banking unit in 2023 after the former President, Andrés Manuel López Obrador, imposed strict...
